refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A varlistentry is an entry in a variablelist. Each varlistentry contains one or more terms and their description or definition.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A term is usually formatted to make it stand out with respect to the text that follows. The best presentation depends on several factors, including the number and length of the terms. See variablelist.
